courseDescription:
'Digital Art' refers to any artistic work involving digital technology in its creation or presentation. Artists are using digital media worldwide to create intricate, beautiful and creative masterpieces. Organisations are also utilising digital media to create intelligent and powerful marketing strategies. Digital art has unlimited possibilities. There are numerous software programs available on the market for creating digital masterpieces. This course will concentrate solely on Clip Studio Paint for the creation of digital art. Clip Studio Paint is a unique program that offers creation, editing and sharing capabilities. This free online course will teach you the fundamentals of creating artworks with Clip Studio Paint.

To begin with, we will introduce you to the interface of the software. Then you will learn about the various menu items and the available panels. Clip Studio Paint has a fantastic feature for layering project elements. We will discuss the significance of layers and how to use them in Clip Studio Paint. Following that, you will learn about the various brushes and how to select one for your project. Any project created in Clip Studio necessitates a series of steps to ensure a smooth workflow of everything. This course will teach you how to make rough drafts and decide on minor details before moving on to the project's final look. We will introduce you to colour palettes and tools used in selecting and blending various colours and an exciting feature known as the 'correction layer'.

The next section of the course will focus entirely on creating colourful portraits and settings. You will learn the various steps that are sequentially involved in creating a complex, colourful portrait and how to make things easy during the process. We will also explain multiple keyboard shortcuts for different functions. Finally, you will learn to add layer masks and ‘adjustment’ layers to digital artworks. This course will equip you with the necessary information to level up your digital design skills and is suitable for anyone who wishes to build a career in graphic design or learn how to create digital art. So grab this opportunity and enrol now!
